item.title: Beautiful Quotes
item.description: ​ Impatience with actions, patience with results. – Naval ​ Your heart needs to break multiple times for it to open up. – Rumi ​ Education is not the learning of facts, but the training of the mind to think – Albert Einstein ​ And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music. – Friedrich Nietzsche ​ Somewhere in the process of maturing into adults, most humans misunderstood comfort for happiness.
